movies.title: Stranger Things
movies.description: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying forces in order to get him back.

movies.title: The Crown
movies.description: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the twentieth century.

movies.title: Narcos
movies.description: A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar, as well as the many other drug kingpins who plagued the country through the years.

New.title: The French Dispatch
New.description: A love letter to journalists set in an outpost of an American newspaper in a fictional 20th-century French city that brings to life a collection of stories published in 'The French Dispatch' magazine.

New.title: Dune
New.description: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel, about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.

New.title: The Last Duel
New.description: King Charles VI declares that Knight Jean de Carrouges settle his dispute with his squire by challenging him to a duel.

Anime.title: Attack on Titan
Anime.description: In a world where humanity lives inside cities surrounded by enormous walls due to the Titans, gigantic humanoid creatures who devour humans seemingly without reason, a young boy named Eren Jaeger dreams of going beyond the walls and seeing what lies beyond.

Anime.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
Anime.description: In Taish≈ç-era Japan, Tanjiro Kamado, a kindhearted boy who sells charcoal for a living, finds his family slaughtered by demons. He sets out on a dangerous journey to become a demon slayer and avenge his family.

Anime.title: My Hero Academia: World Heroes' Mission
Anime.description: When a mysterious group called Humanize plans to wipe out all Quirk users, the heroes of UA must spring into action to stop them and protect the world.

Anime.title: Yasuke
Anime.description: In a war-torn feudal Japan filled with mechs and magic, a retired ronin must take up his sword once more to protect a mysterious child with dark powers from those who seek to use her for their own purposes.

Anime.title: Edens Zero
Anime.description: In the distant future, a young boy named Shiki Granbell sets out on a journey to find his place in the world, accompanied by a group of companions including a sentient android and a talking cat.

Action.title: The Matrix
Action.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

Action.title: Forrest Gump
Action.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and the civil rights movement shape the life of a young man from Alabama.

Action.title: The Shawshank Redemption
Action.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
